channel.title: swiftui on Saikat Kumar Dey

item.title: Building a Minimalist Habit Tracking App for Myself Using SwiftUI
item.description: I built a simple, offline habit tracking app for myself using SwiftUI to learn practical iOS development skills and end up with a custom productivity tool tailored to my needs.
